      • xwikiAuthenticate

        protected Principal xwikiAuthenticate(String userId,
                                      String pamPassword,
                                      com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiContext context)
                               throws com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException
        Try both local and global DB login if trylocal is true Principal.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user provided in input
        pamPassword - the password of the user to log in.
        context - the XWiki context.
        Returns:
        the Principal.
        Throws:
        com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException - error when checking user name and password.

      • authenticate

        public Principal authenticate(String userId,
                              String password,
                              com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiContext context)
                       throws com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException
        Specified by:
        authenticate in interface com.xpn.xwiki.user.api.XWikiAuthService

      • pamAuthenticateInContext

        protected Principal pamAuthenticateInContext(String userNameRaw,
                                             String validXWikiUserName,
                                             String password,
                                             boolean trusted,
                                             com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiContext context,
                                             boolean local)
                                      throws com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException
        Try PAM login for given context and return Principal.
        Parameters:
        userNameRaw - the user name (not uid) of the UNIX user
        validXWikiUserName - the name of the XWiki user to log in.
        password - the password of the user to log in.
        trusted - true in case of trusted authentication (i.e. should the credentials be validated or not)
        context - the XWiki context.
        local - indicate if it's a local authentication. Supposed to return a local user Principal (without the wiki name).
        Returns:
        the Principal.
        Throws:
        com.xpn.xwiki.XWikiException - for failed logins
        Since:
        9.0
